# Expert survey


## Purpose

- Draw on expert knowledge & assessment of situation in Flanders
  - introduction & establishment
  - distribution & abundance
  - impacts
  - monitoring
  - management
- Assess [feasiblity]{style="text-decoration:underline"} and [urgency]{style="text-decoration:underline"} of monitoring schemes per species
- Prioritize Union List (candidate) IAS for monitoring in Flanders
